itunes:title: Kicking Off a Wonderfully Creative Year
title: Kicking Off a Wonderfully Creative Year
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, discusses the main reasons why writers give up, as well as all the things that get in the way of creativity: the pursuit of perfection; allowing the inner critic too much head space; not prioritizing your writing; procrastination and the fear of failure. Consider this your pep talk to ensure a kick-ass creative year!
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, discusses the main reasons why writers give up, as well as all the things that get in the way of creativity: the pursuit of perfection; allowing the inner critic too much head space; not prioritizing your writing; procrastination and the fear of failure. Consider this your pep talk to ensure a kick-ass creative year!
itunes:author: Bianca Marais
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, publishing advice, writing advice, pep talk, why writers give up,
